name: UIPointerEffect
desc: An effect that alters a view's appearance when a pointer enters the current region.

items.name: var preview: UITargetedPreview
items.desc: A preview of the view used during an interaction's animations.

items.name: case automatic(UITargetedPreview)
items.desc: A pointer content effect with the given preview's view.

items.name: case highlight(UITargetedPreview)
items.desc: An effect where the pointer slides under the given view and morphs into the view's shape.

items.name: case hover(UITargetedPreview, preferredTintMode: UIPointerEffect.TintMode, prefersShadow: Bool, prefersScaledContent: Bool)
items.desc: An effect where visual changes are applied to the view and the pointer retains its default shape.

items.name: case lift(UITargetedPreview)
items.desc: An effect where the pointer slides under the given view and disappears as the view scales up and gains a shadow.
